visuals.title: Unit Step Function u(t)
visuals.description: The switch function: zero for t<0, one for t≥0. Building block for piecewise signals.

visuals.title: Rectangular Pulse rect(t)
visuals.description: A box function: equal to 1 for |t| ≤ 1/2, zero elsewhere. Finite duration, finite energy.

visuals.title: Triangular Pulse tri(t)
visuals.description: A triangle: ramps up to 1 at t=0, then ramps down. Smoother transitions than rect(t).
